LpBase::Expr::ConstCoeffIt Class Reference

Detailed Description

The iterator iterates over the terms of the expression.

         double s=0;
         for(LpBase::Expr::ConstCoeffIt i(e);i!=INVALID;++i)
           s+=*i * primal(i);

#include <lemon/lp_base.h>
